text: Sirak M. Sabahat (; born December 5, 1981) is an Israeli actor. He is known for his role in the film Live and Become. ==Filmography== *Live and Become (2005) *Comme au cinéma (2005) *The Children of СССР (2007) ==Further reading== * * ==References== ==External links== * Category:1981 births Category:Beta Israel Category:Israeli male film actors Category:Israeli male stage actors Category:Israeli male television actors Category:Jewish Israeli male actors Category:Living people Category:Israeli people of Ethiopian-Jewish descent
title: Sirak M. Sabahat
